title: Please Help Me!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: So recently i updated to windows 10, but before i updated i ran normally 60 ping and 200+ fps with the exception of spikes.  my first game using windows 10 i got into the game and hap 7-14 fps the entire game. i don't know if it is windows 10, but i don't know what to do. PLEASE HELP! (if u fix i will add u and gift u :D)

replies.body: Your computer might be having some problems rendering files for the game properly.  You might need to change some settings or update your drivers for your new OS to get things running smoothly again.  I suggest going through the steps provided in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to get this resolved.  Hopefully, that will return things to normal for you, but let me know!
